name: Etyllica
tagline: A 2D Game Engine in pure Java.
body:
### About the Engine
Etyllica is a pure Java Game Engine to make games fast. It can render 3D (by software) using jGL in unsigned applets and streams audio with SoundSystem Library. Etyllica have its own GUI System.

### Dependencies (included)

- jGL (An OpenGL simulator - [http://www.cmlab.csie.ntu.edu.tw/~robin/jGL/](http://www.cmlab.csie.ntu.edu.tw/~robin/jGL/)).

- SoundSystem (Audio Library - [http://www.paulscode.com/forum/index.php?topic=4.0](http://www.paulscode.com/forum/index.php?topic=4.0)), WAV, JOgg, JOrbis and MP3 codec plug-in ([http://www.paulscode.com/forum/index.php?topic=496.0](http://www.paulscode.com/forum/index.php?topic=496.0)).
